department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Commercial and office building construction services
description: Building Restoration and Asbestos Abatement Standing Offer: Work sites for this Standing Offer will be CFB Suffield sites including DND, BATUS and DRDC occupied buildings.
full_summary:
**Title**
[ ENG ] W6897-230065 : Building Restoration and Asbestos Abatement Standing Offer
　　　 　 　 [ FRA ] W6897-230065 Offre à commandes pour la réhabilitation des bâtiments et l'élimination de l'amiante

**Reference Number**
WS3954910695-Doc3954936966

**Tender Information**
*   The tender date was published on May 23, 2023.
*   The tender closing date was June 15, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT.
*   The tender was expired.
*   The work requirements include:
    •   Commercial and office building construction services
    •   Emergency restoration work
    •   Wind/water/fire damage clean up
    •   Asbestos/Mould Abatement when and where required.
*   Work sites are CFB Suffield sites, including DND, BATUS, and DRDC occupied buildings and other infrastructure in Ralston
*   Regions of opportunity include Alberta.

**Contracting Entity**
The contract is administered by :
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
The end-user is the:
Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN)
101 Colonel By Dr,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A0K2,Canada

**Contact**
For more information contact Matthew Virakorn, SPAC/PSPC:
Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please let me know if you wanted me to change anything. Hopeful waiting for a response, and for this text to be reviewed carefully. 

Cheers, my friend!
